title: Junior Frontend Developer and Marketing Specialist
name: Confect ApS
description: I contributed to the development of new screens and features for Confect's marketing website using Next.js and to the main application built with Angular. My primary accomplishment was a complete redesign of the registration/signup flow, where I led the visual design and implemented the validation and user feedback processes, delivering a significant upgrade to the user experience.

title: Junior Developer
name: Estaid
description: I contributed to the development of basic functionality for our service using Vue.js, added new Mapbox layers to our platform, and set up Amplitude tracking to enhance analytics. Additionally, I supported sales and marketing efforts through our CRM platform and paid advertising campaigns. My work involved utilizing skills in TypeScript, Vue.js, SQL, Git, and Amplitude Analytics.

title: Head of Growth and Marketing
name: Kontainer - Digital Asset Management since 2001
description: I was responsible for implementing a new CRM platform, streamlining our paid ads setup along with tracking and attribution solutions, and collaborating with an agency to deliver a new brand video and accompanying creatives.

title: Paid Social Specialist
name: SPASIBA
description: I was responsible for developing new paid marketing strategies, planning and executing campaigns, and evaluating the ROI of marketing initiatives for our clients to ensure their effectiveness.

title: Head of Paid Traffic
name: Karman Connect A/S
description: I was responsible for developing new paid marketing strategies, planning and executing internal campaigns, and evaluating the ROI of marketing initiatives to ensure their success.

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
name: Web2Media ApS
description: I was responsible for developing revenue and lead-generating strategies for both B2B and B2C audiences, managing and overseeing various projects, and training and mentoring employees internally and externally. Additionally, I handled budget planning, setting targets, and overseeing the planning of marketing initiatives and materials.
